videos.description:
After looking unstoppable in the first week of La Vuelta, Remco Evenepoel showed his first signs of weakness in the high mountains as Primo≈æ Rogliƒç and Enric Mas ate into his GC lead. Dan rounds up the action from the second week of the race and the other pro races, and Conor catches up with former Zwift Academy winner Jay Vine to talk about his success at this year's Vuelta.

Chapters:
00:00 Intro
00:40 Vuelta a Espa√±a
07:19 Jay Vine interview
11:35 Simac Ladies Tour
13:15 Tour of Britain
14:33 Coming up on GCN+
16:31 Maryland Cycling Classic
17:28 Other news
18:07 Transfer news

videos.title: Finishes don't get closer than this! #shorts

videos.description:
Stage 2 is a tricky hilly stage with three Cat-3 climbs in the final few kilometres before the finish. The finale of this stage replicates the intensity of the final lap of a World Championships, so expect with attacks to fly from left, right and centre. The descent to the finish off Hardens Hill means that a rider will have to be confident in their bike handling abilities if they are to hold off the peloton with a late attack.

Noisy freehubs pretty polarising; you either love that zing or hate it's irritating buzz! However, if you're not happy with how your freehub sounds you can tune it to make those freehub sound-checks extra spicy! Alex shows you how.

Brought to you by the world's biggest cycling channel, the Global Cycling Network (GCN), GCN Tech is the only channel you need for all things bike tech ‚Äì past, present and future.

Simply put, we're obsessed with tech: we seek out and showcase the best in bikes, components, tech, accessories, upgrades and more from races and events, tech shows and product launches across the globe to bring you the best in road bike technology.

We've also got great maintenance videos to help you get the most from your bike; pro-bike tours from all the biggest races; special features and the weekly GCN Tech Show. We also take a deeper look into the future of cycling, apps, smart tech and virtual riding. 

Join us on the channel and the GCN App to submit your content, vote on the latest tech and keep abreast of exciting new trends.

videos.title: First Grand Tour Stage Win! #shorts

videos.description:
Stage 15 is the Queen stage of the 2022 Vuelta a Espa√±a. The peloton first take on the Cat-1 Alto del Purche (8.5km at 7.6%), before the only "Especial" category climb of the race: the 2,512m-high summit of Sierra Nevada. At 22.1km in length with an average gradient of 6.7%, this is the hardest climb at the race and one that's certain to flip the GC on its head.

videos.description:
This year's Tour of Britain begins in Scotland, as the riders will set off from Aberdeen on stage 1 to the Glenshee Ski Centre. The hilltop finish up the Cairnwell Pass could provide the perfect launchpad for an attack to the line, but at an average gradient of 6% over the last 3km, it will take a strong rider to make a move stick.

videos.title: Too Strong In The Uphill Sprint! #shorts

videos.description:
Can a complete beginner cyclist ride 30 miles (48km)? It may not sound a long way to the most seasoned cyclists but it can be a daunting task for a novice. So, back by popular demand is our beginner Harriet, who joins Manon for her first significant bike ride. How will she fare in her latest challenge?

The Global Cycling Network (GCN) is the largest online cycling channel in the world, bringing together a global community of road cyclists to celebrate everything that's great about the world of cycling.

Our videos bring fans compelling daily content including expert tutorials, techniques, training, racing, cutting-edge bike tech, unparalleled behind the scenes event coverage, humour,  entertainment, and more.

Presented by ex-pro riders, GCN offers a uniquely qualified insight into the world of cycling, and most importantly it's fuelled by our passionate and enthusiastic fans ‚Äì everyone who makes up the GCN community. We also bring the latest and greatest tech to your attention, showcase the best places in the world to ride and get exclusive access to events and races.

Welcome to the Global Cycling Network | Inside Cycling

videos.description:
Is this the most expensive bike upgrade? Alex met with jewellery designer Justin to go for a ride and to take a look at what is perhaps the most bling bike in the world: a Pinarello F decorated with ¬£15,000 worth of diamond and white gold art. This is bike-jazzling to the extreme!

videos.title: Carapaz Takes The Summit! #shorts

videos.description:
Stage 14 sees the riders make their way into the infamous Sierra Nevada mountain range for yet another summit finish, this time atop the Sierra de la Pandera (22.9km at 5.2%) - a popular climb at La Vuelta having featured five times since its first appearance in 2002. The last part of the climb - 8.2km at 7.2% - is by far the toughest and will surely create time gaps between the GC contenders!

videos.description:
As the world's largest manufacturer of bicycle components, we regularly refer to all of Shimano's different groupset tiers on the channel, but not everyone may know which is which. To help explain, Ollie takes you through all six Shimano road groupsets, from Dura-Ace to Claris, giving you the lowdown on their main features and differences.

In association with @#RideShimano üëâ https://gcn.eu/Shimano

00:51 What is a groupset?
01:59 Dura-Ace

04:48 105
09:28 Tiagra
11:40 Sora
16:40 Claris
17:44 Summary

Brought to you by the world's biggest cycling channel, the Global Cycling Network (GCN), GCN Tech is the only channel you need for all things bike tech ‚Äì past, present and future.

Simply put, we're obsessed with tech: we seek out and showcase the best in bikes, components, tech, accessories, upgrades and more from races and events, tech shows and product launches across the globe to bring you the best in road bike technology.

We've also got great maintenance videos to help you get the most from your bike; pro-bike tours from all the biggest races; special features and the weekly GCN Tech Show. We also take a deeper look into the future of cycling, apps, smart tech and virtual riding. 

Join us on the channel and the GCN App to submit your content, vote on the latest tech and keep abreast of exciting new trends.

videos.title: Everything You Need To Know About Shimano Groupsets

videos.description:
Maybe legs aside, road cyclists are certainly not known for having muscles. Bodybuilders on the other hand, are all about strength and massive muscles. You could say that bodybuilders and cyclists are polar opposites. Well then, what would happen if a bodybuilder went head-to-head with a cyclist? Hank and Ollie met champion bodybuilder Brad Parker for some challenges!

Chapters:
00:00 Intro
02:11 Biceps Challenge
03:29 Chest Press Challenge
06:42 Leg Press Challenge
09:20 Static Bike Sprint
11:07 Hill Climb Challenge

Thanks to Base Gym in Bristol & to Matt Thomas for the pictures.

What other challenges would you like to see us do with Brad? Let us know in the comments below! üí¨

videos.title: Long, Hot Day With A Steep Final Ramp! | Vuelta A Espa√±a 2022 Stage 13 Highlights

videos.description:
As you may well have noticed after seeing him covered in bandages and looking like a mummy, Alex had a huge crash while out riding a couple of months ago that sent him to hospital with severe road rash and kept him off the bike for a number of weeks. He documented his recovery and journey to get back on the bike, as well as sharing exactly what happened in his crash!

Visit the GCN Shop: https://gcn.eu/gcnshop
Join the GCN Club: https://www.gcnclub.com/

Have you ever had to work your way back to fitness like Alex? Let us know in the comments below! üí¨

videos.title: Vuelta Delivers A Breakaway Blockbuster On Summit Finish! #shorts

videos.description:
The spotlight passes back over the GC contenders on stage 12 as the peloton heads towards the fourth summit finish of the race. The climb to Pe√±as Blancas (19km at 6.3%) is the only categorised climb of the day, so most should arrive at the foot of it with a fresh pair of legs. It's a serious test and one that's bound to create some significant gaps between the major players.

videos.title: Breakaway Battles It Out On Pe√±as Blancas! | Vuelta A Espa√±a 2022 Stage 12 Highlights

videos.description:
Alex is joined by Manon on this week's Tech Show, where they discuss bike geometry and if manufacturers are getting it all wrong! We also have news of a gravel specific pump and a bike with a kitchen sink on it (yes, really!), as well as your top comments of the week and a bike vault with a bit of a twist! 

Chapters:

Brought to you by the world's biggest cycling channel, the Global Cycling Network (GCN), GCN Tech is the only channel you need for all things bike tech ‚Äì past, present and future.

Simply put, we're obsessed with tech: we seek out and showcase the best in bikes, components, tech, accessories, upgrades and more from races and events, tech shows and product launches across the globe to bring you the best in road bike technology.

We've also got great maintenance videos to help you get the most from your bike; pro-bike tours from all the biggest races; special features and the weekly GCN Tech Show. We also take a deeper look into the future of cycling, apps, smart tech and virtual riding. 

Join us on the channel and the GCN App to submit your content, vote on the latest tech and keep abreast of exciting new trends.
